data.title: The Human Side of Airbnbâ€™s Microservice Architecture
data.description: Jessica Tai discusses lessons learned by Airbnb from its migration to microservices, covering cross-team collaboration strategies, designing observability access control, and planning for unified APIs.
data.author: Jessica Tai
